Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak for decades, responded carefully when asked whether he is a dictator. He clearly has perpetuated himself in office. He clearly has hoped that his son would succeed him. There have been a number of things that have inhibited freer political systems, Donald Rumsfeld said of the Egyptian president, stopping short of offering any further criticism of Hosni Mubarak . Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
